00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_EXPONENT_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_EXPONENT_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class ExponentElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 private:
00037                         ElementID mElement;
00038                         Real mExponent;
00039                         const PipelineElement1D *mElementPtr;
00040 
00041                 public:
00042                         ExponentElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID element, Real exponent) : mElement(element), mExponent(exponent)
00043                         {
00044                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement(element);
00045                         }
00046                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00047                         {
00048                                 Real value;
00049                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, cache);
00050                                 return (std::pow (std::fabs ((value + Real(1.0)) / Real(2.0)), mExponent) * Real(2.0) - Real(1.0));
00051                         }
00052         };
00053 
00054         class ExponentElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00055         {
00056                 private:
00057                         ElementID mElement;
00058                         Real mExponent;
00059                         const PipelineElement2D *mElementPtr;
00060 
00061                 public:
00062                         ExponentElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID element, Real exponent) : mElement(element), mExponent(exponent)
00063                         {
00064                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement(element);
00065                         }
00066                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00067                         {
00068                                 Real value;
00069                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, y, cache);
00070                                 return (std::pow (std::fabs ((value + Real(1.0)) / Real(2.0)), mExponent) * Real(2.0) - Real(1.0));
00071                         }
00072         };
00073 
00074         class ExponentElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00075         {
00076                 private:
00077                         ElementID mElement;
00078                         Real mExponent;
00079                         const PipelineElement3D *mElementPtr;
00080 
00081                 public:
00082                         ExponentElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID element, Real exponent) : mElement(element), mExponent(exponent)
00083                         {
00084                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement(element);
00085                         }
00086                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00087                         {
00088                                 Real value;
00089                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, y, z, cache);
00090                                 return (std::pow (std::fabs ((value + Real(1.0)) / Real(2.0)), mExponent) * Real(2.0) - Real(1.0));
00091                         }
00092         };
00093 
00097         class ExponentModule : public Module
00098         {
00099                 private:
00100                         Real mExponent;
00101 
00102                 public:
00104                         ExponentModule() : Module(1), mExponent(1.0)
00105                         {
00106                         }
00108                         void setExponent (Real v)
00109                         {
00110                                 mExponent = v;
00111                         }
00113                         Real getExponent () const
00114                         {
00115                                 return mExponent;
00116                         }
00118                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00119                         {
00120                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00121                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00122                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ExponentElement1D(pipe, first, mExponent));
00123                         }
00125                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00126                         {
00127                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00128                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00129                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ExponentElement2D(pipe, first, mExponent));
00130                         }
00132                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00133                         {
00134                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00135                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00136                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ExponentElement3D(pipe, first, mExponent));
00137                         }
00139                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_EXPONENT; }
00140 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00142                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00144                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00145 #endif
00146         };
00147 };
